participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Frank is a laid-back and straightforward individual who values honesty and simplicity in life. He enjoys sharing his experiences and has a no-nonsense approach to conversations.
participant_1.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i've been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is energetic and upbeat, often using humor to lighten the mood. She enjoys connecting with others and has a lively personality, making her well-liked in social situations.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i go to the gym regularly.
